title: Outdoor Kitchens & Fire Features
intro: Extend your living room outside. Custom masonry islands and fire pits that make your backyard the neighborhood gathering spot.
highlights: Built-in grills, pizza ovens, and beverage centers
Durable granite, concrete, or stone countertops
Wood-burning and gas fire pits with seating walls
Overhead structures (pergolas) for shade and fan mounting

avgCost.notes: Simple grill islands start lower; full kitchens with plumbing and electrical run higher.

faqs.q: Does the team handle the gas and electrical lines?
faqs.a: Yes, verified teams include licensed trade partners to safely run gas, water, and electrical to your new outdoor island.

faqs.q: Can you build a fire pit on my existing patio?
faqs.a: Often yes, but the crew may need to cut into the patio to run gas lines or ensure proper heat shielding.
